package basics;

public class CodeFormattingandDebugging {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		// $$$$$$$$$$code format and align code $$$$$$$$$$$$$
		/*
		 * ctrl + shift +f
		 */
		
		
		//$$$$$$$$$$$ Naming convention $$$$$$$$$$$$
		
		/*
		 * variable Name,methodname should start with small letter[camel case]
		 * like String firstName
		 * className should start with capital letter
		 */
		
		//$$$$$$$$ Debug code in eclipse $$$$$$$$$$$$ - execute step by step 
		/*
		 * go to the line in code 
		 * 
		 * 		right click select toggle break point
		 * right click select debug as java application
		 * 
		 * 
		 * now accept switch , and 
		 * to see step by step execution click on step over [F6]
		 * 
		 * now that line will get executed and pointer moves to next step
		 * 
		 * 
		 * to come out of debug mode press resume and it will execute in normal fashion
		 * 
		 * Whenever there is a method and we want to execute method we have to press 
		 * stepInto[f5] go into that method
		 */

	}

}
